channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 16:29 WARNING !!!Threat of the use of guided aerial bombs (GABs).
item.description: 🟠 16:29 WARNING !!!Threat of the use of guided aerial bombs (GABs).#Zaporizhzhia_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
